articles.author: Robert Lea,SPACE.com
articles.title: Largest-Ever Cosmic Explosion Has Raged for Years - Scientific American
articles.description: For at least three years, the mysterious blast has shined ten times brighter than any supernova
articles.content:
Astronomers have witnessed the largest explosion in space. 
The explosive event labeled AT2021lwx was observed to be ten times brighter than any known supernova, the explosions that occur as massive… [+5230 chars]
